website_summaries.verdict: Between her true-to-the cartoon design, sassy one-liners, and adorable songs, Talking Brittany is easily the best of the Chipettes toys available.
pros: Says 15 cute and chirpy phrases like “I love to sing!” and sings when you press Brittany’s tummy
cons: Brittany’s hard plastic head isn’t cuddly

customer_reviews.title: Dog toy now
customer_reviews.text: My child wasn’t interested in this doll. She didn’t take any interest in her at all. When she opened it for her birthday, she discarded it immediately. She has silly sayings and seems to be good quality. I have since given it to the dog. I will say the dog seems to like biting her and making the doll talk. Obviously not what I purchased it for but at least someone is playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Talking doll
customer_reviews.text: It does talk even though there's probably more good looking dolls out there. I got this for my two year old for Easter. She did play with it for awhile. I just feel that they shouldn't had made this doll so fugly. Other than that it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: FiveInACup

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: The worst. It’s even uglier in person and barely works. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brittany!
customer_reviews.text: This toy was adorable and a perfect Brittany. Our child was thrilled and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee

customer_reviews.title: Be careful taking doll out of box. Chipettes are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality and doll itself. Exactly what my daughter wanted. However doll’s grad is a bit heavy and my family snipped her out of box and snipped the wire tie attaching her head to her body. Reparable thank goodness but unfortunate with a brand new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this cute little chipmunk doll! Was well worth the money I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA BARROW

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My babies loved this doll I got 2 for my grandbabys
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Linda Barrera

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED FOR MY DAUGHTER ALONG WITH ALVIN. SHE'S GOING TO LOVE THEM BOTH
customer_reviews.author: CQ RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Great for ages 2-12
customer_reviews.text: She is so cute!My Granddaughter loves her.And.coincidentally,my Grandkids were watching the Chipmunks when the doll arrived!my
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Bailey McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend to any Alvin and the Chipmunks
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this talking Brittany doll. Would definitely recommend to any Alvin and the Chipmunks lover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. My 4 year old is a huge chipmunk fan and she loves it! I want to get her the other dolls as well eventually!
customer_reviews.author: MzAries11

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous inexpensive talking doll!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great doll and my daughter loves her! Easy to play with and inexpensive for a talking doll. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: lisa rhodes-ryabchich

customer_reviews.title: I am collecting, watching the drawing since it started to pass in Brazil
customer_reviews.text: thank you very much for sending, I believe to be the first to have it in Brazil thanks to you
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Spadin Ferreira Leite dos Santos

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Alvin & the Chipmunks, Talking Brittany
product_meta.description: Now your child can laugh and sing with their favorite Chipette pal, Brittany. Have your child press her belly to hear her say fun clever phrases just like she says on her show. This talking plush Brittany is part of an assortment of talking dolls that includes your child's favorite Chipmunk and Chipette pals from the hit TV show, ALVINNN!!! AND THE CHIPMUNKS! Each sold separately and subject to availability.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Collect them all. Each sold separately and subject to availability

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
